scripts.dev:app: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build:app: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.prod:app: concurrently "npm run prod --prefix server" "npm run preview --prefix client"
scripts.gen:api-app: npm run gen:api --prefix client && npm run gen:api --prefix server
scripts.dev:electron-app: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix electron"
